title: wine_Ken_Forrester_2008_The_Gypsy_G-S-M_(Western_Cape)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 128304.
country: South Africa.
description: Fleshy fruit tones of cherry, plum, blackberry and raspberry all abound on the nose of this G-S-M blend, alongside secondary hints of black pepper and cured meat. There's a nice evolution to the medium-weight palate, which starts off with fruity dominance but then transitions to spice, followed by sweet smoke and finally ends of a decadent mocha flavor. It's firmly textured with gripping tannins and a long finish..
designation: The Gypsy.
points: 90.
price: 65.0.
province: Western Cape.
region_1: .
region_2: .
taster_name: Lauren Buzzeo.
